title: Meet THALES and MITRE (TRANSHUMANISM, “DIGITAL TWINNING,” + THE INTERNET OF BODIES)
cleaned_text: Publisher’s Note: Meet THALES. For US Humans unfamiliar with “The Internet Of Bodies” (TIOB) paradigm being ushered in by the Fourth Industrial Revolution’s “Great Reset,” the Gray Zone founder and journalist Max Blumenthal breaks down the details on the Jimmy Dore Show, along with a critique of Noam Chomsky at 90 years old. Blumenthal’s new article on MITRE and new “Digital Vaccine Passports” is also worth a close read – as we’ve reported for several years now, Pentagon and Deep State players have used the Virus to usher in the TIOB – a Transhumanist vision championed by the Davos crowd, as well – including the World Economic Forum and the Gates/Pharma Cabal.. See the WEF’s helpful (ha!) Venn diagram on “Digital Identity” (also known as “Digital Twinning”) here:
